description: This file defines two Angular HTTP interceptors: one for attaching authentication tokens to requests, and another for handling authorization errors such as 401 responses, redirecting to the login page.

methods.name: authInterceptor
methods.description: Intercepts outgoing HTTP requests to attach a Bearer token if available.

methods.name: authErrorInterceptor
methods.description: Intercepts HTTP responses to handle 401 Unauthorized errors by clearing tokens and redirecting to login.

ctags.name: authErrorInterceptor
ctags.pattern: /^export const authErrorInterceptor: HttpInterceptorFn = (req: HttpRequest<any>, next: HttpHandler/

ctags.name: authInterceptor
ctags.pattern: /^export const authInterceptor: HttpInterceptorFn = (req: HttpRequest<any>, next: HttpHandlerFn) =/
